I just wanted to drop a line saying that I hope all of you are having a great Holiday Season (at least for those who have a holiday season)! If you guys need anything at all and I can help, be sure to drop a line! You can find me on my Apocamorphosis Public Discord. https://discord.gg/y3V4hbN

Other than that! I also wanted to thank everyone for all your help this year and hope that I can contribute more next year!

Anonynn.

Posts.EditableText: Hope everyone had a great Christmas and that the New Year will be inspirational.

Posts.EditableText:
I had the most unusual christmas... assembling a trampoline (can't spell), took like 4-5 hours... metal was too tight, hard to get the screws in the leg pieces, grr. We had to shave/file/grind off the too-small oval holes, to get the screws in as well, 8 legs... took like 15-30 minutes for each leg... least we got it done though. The directions that came with it were horrible as well...

Merry Christmas everyone, and enjoy the new year when it comes (a few more days away)!

Posts.EditableText:
ya, the springs were a bit difficult... we didn't think ahead of time on which springs to do first... makes a big differences...

we undid all of the springs except those in the corners and in the middle of the 4 sides, then we did the rest of the springs, skipping one (spring, skip string, spring), and by doing it that way, along with the simple metal hook tool to pull the springs), we got them all hooked up.

-----

@ XanMag:

coitus? not understanding your usage of this word... do you mean you had to do something problematic/irritating/difficult too?

HK edit:

wow, I'm an idiot... I just now got what you were saying... haha... except that'd be some... cringe'ful-coitus... lol.
